Description:
Exports the target Registry key and hides it in the specified alternate data stream.

Author: Oddvar Moe, Sander Wiebing, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Exports Registry Key To an Alternate Data Stream
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%\regedit.exe'
